en.validator.password: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters and contain at least one uppercase letter and one number
en.validator.email: Email must be a valid email address
en.validator.username: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters, start with a letter, and contain only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, or periods
en.validator.url: URL must be a valid URL
en.validator.phone_number: Phone number must be a valid phone number
en.validator.time_range: The start time must be before the end time
